title: Random Integer Array in Range
description: In this lab, we will explore how to generate a random integer array within a specified range using JavaScript. We will use the Array.from() method to create an empty array and fill it with randomly generated integers using Math.random() and Math.floor(). By the end of this lab, you will have a solid understanding of how to generate random integers in JavaScript and apply this knowledge to your own projects.

meta.title: Generate Random Integer Arrays in JavaScript
meta.description: Learn how to create random integer arrays within a specific range using JavaScript.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, random integers, javascript practice online, programming tutorial, array generation, javascript lab, javascript tutor

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
